title: Collaborative Problem-Solving-Based STEM Leadership Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental STEM concepts and basic project management
context.additional_context: STEM-integrated project implementation for solving social issues within corporations, utilizing collaboration tools in a limited technological environment (smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Collaborate with team members of varying prior knowledge levels to develop STEM-based project plans for solving social issues
Contextually apply cognitive strategies (e.g., data analysis) and metacognitive strategies (e.g., self-monitoring) during project execution
Learners can utilize effective social interaction strategies based on group dynamics (e.g., role division, feedback exchange).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
